definitions: An act of committing a crime or an offence.
An act of entrusting someone or something to someone or something.
An unconditional undertaking or a pledge to do something.
A point in the development of a piece of software at which a set of changes are committed to a repository.
examples: The commit of the crime was witnessed.
The commit of the patient to the care of the hospital.
They made a commit to the project.
The latest commit introduced a bug.
